content:

inventory=[{"type": "magenta_terracotta", "quantity": 40, "index": 13}, {"type": "white_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "crimson_hyphae", "quantity": 37, "index": 17}, {"type": "diorite", "quantity": 4, "index": 18}, {"type": "cooked_cod", "quantity": 63, "index": 25}, {"type": "dead_brain_coral", "quantity": 31, "index": 26}, {"type": "obsidian", "quantity": 28, "index": 33}, {"type": "polished_blackstone", "quantity": 3, "index": 34}, {"type": "golden_helmet", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}]

thought: To craft a polished_blackstone_slab, I need to place 3 polished_blackstone side by side in the crafting grid. There are currently 3 polished_blackstone in slot 34. Therefore, I will move one of them to slot 1.
act: move from slot 34 to slot 1 with quantity 1

thought: To craft a polished_blackstone_slab, I need to place 3 polished_blackstone side by side in the crafting grid. I have already done this, so I can now craft the polished_blackstone_slab by moving it from the crafting grid to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 6
